metadata.title: CVE-2019-14587 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Logic issue EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enabledenial of service via adjacent access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14587` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3
qemu-efi - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0~20191122.bd85bf54-2ubuntu3').
